remarks: Elements of the free module are set functions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
statement:
frlmval.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmbasmap.n $e |- N = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmbasmap.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmbasmap $p |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> X e. ( N ^m I ) ) $.
